title: Sylvan Scimitar
content:
Instead of its Dexterity Modifier, the affected entity add its Spellcasting Ability Modifier to Attack Rolls.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Everything moves strangely in the Feywild from rivers to behaviours. It's a mercurial place, where the magical and physical can pass permeably through one another.

Scimitar Light Finesse

Sylvan Scimitar is one of the Scimitar Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Sylvan Scimitar is a magical scimitar that adds the spellcasting m
